title: Updated version and fixed course sync issue
message: Updated version and fixed course sync issue

title: Remove unnecessary TabLayout style stuff
message:
Remove unnecessary TabLayout style stuff

Most of the TabLayout styling provided was unnecessary and it was
overriding style attributes provided by the Design Support Library's
framework in such a way that the tab layout did not follow the Material Design
Guidelines.

The Design Support Library, however, uses the accent colour by default for the tab
indicator colour so that overriden attribute was left in place.

title: Use TextInputEditText in TextInputLayout
message:
Use TextInputEditText in TextInputLayout

See https://stackoverflow.com/questions/35775919/edittext-added-is-not-a-textinputedittext-please-switch-to-using-that-class-ins

title: Log in screen visual refresh
message:
Log in screen visual refresh

Also as part of the ongoing efforts to improve user acceptance of the log in process:

- "ID Number" text field label changed to "Username"
- "Sign in" button text changed to "Log In"

because those are the text labels used on the OurVLE website's log in
form. I'm hoping that this consistency will in some way be beneficial.

Furthermore, the colorControlHighlight style item was removed because I
mistakenly thought it was also necessary for styling text fields' colour
in their pressed state.

title: Update gradle build stuff
message:
Update gradle build stuff

- Update to Gradle 4.0
- Update to Support Library 25.4.0
- Update to Gson 2.7
- Update to SDK Build Tools 25.0.3
- Modify Gradle config in order to retrieve the Support Libraries from
Google's Maven repository

title: Style log out dialog actions' colour
message:
Style log out dialog actions' colour

Actions now styled with brand accent colour.
Also refactored and renamed custom dialog style name introduced for the
login help dialog so it can be used for all app dialogs.

title: Remove alert dialog's negative action
message:
Remove alert dialog's negative action

The dialog's content is purely informative and does not present a call
to any sort of action.

title: Remove redundant colour resource
message:
Remove redundant colour resource

Android has a platform colour resource for white (android:color/white).

message:
